settings.description: Blogging about software design/architecture, infrastructure, and automated testing.

author.name: TJ Maynes
author.description: TJ Maynes is a passionate Software Engineer living in NYC. TJ has built scalable software solutions across many technology stacks (frontend to database to infrastructure) and utilizes test-driven development and pair programming to grow complex software and teams. Currently, spending a bit of time learning distributed systems design patterns and functional programming concepts. Also, enjoys â˜•.
author.footnote-message: If you happened to catch any missing or incorrect details in the post, please drop me an email. And as always, thank you for reading and I hope you catch my next blog post soon!
